long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the world of power and ambition with the Scarface Al Pacino-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and bold interface inspired by Tony Montana’s iconic style and gritty persona.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that channels the raw intensity of Scarface.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Effortlessly navigate to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Immerse yourself in Scarface-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with tools as powerful and ambitious as Tony Montana himself.
